title: Peanut Crunch Bars
directions: Combine 1 cup of sugar and corn syrup; bring to a boil but do not cook.
Put in 8 x 4 inch pan and pack down.  Cool and frost if desired.
To make Frosting:  Combine last 4 ingredients and boil 1 minute; beating well.  Frost and cut into bars.
ingredients: 5 cups high protein crisp rice and wheat cereal
